Info.Title: Jack and the Cuckoo-Clock Heart
Info.Genre: Animation, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Musical, Romance
Info.Writer: Mathias Malzieu (novel), Mathias Malzieu (screenplay), Mathias Malzieu (story), Mathias Malzieu
Info.Actors: Mathias Malzieu, Olivia Ruiz, Grand Corps Malade, Jean Rochefort
Info.Plot: A 19th-century drama about a man whose heart was replaced with a clock when he was born. The situation dictates that he should avoid feeling strong emotions -- love, most of all -- but he just can't keep his feelings under wraps.
